## querystring() function

Returns a querystring-formatted string (e.g. &amp;arg=val&amp;arg2=val2) from a params object (e.g. {<!-- -->arg: 'val', arg2: 'val2'<!-- -->}<!-- -->) Note: You must prepend it with ? when adding it to a URL.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function querystring(querystringParams: {
    [key: string]: string | number;
}): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  querystringParams | <code>{</code><br/><code>    [key: string]: string &#124; number;</code><br/><code>}</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`
